Source.Name: expect
Source.Summary: Expect is a tool for automating and testing interactive applications
Source.Description: Expect is a tool for automating interactive applications such as telnet, ftp, passwd, fsck, rlogin, tip, etc. Expect is also useful for testing these same applications.

Package.Name: expect
Package.Summary: Expect is a tool for automating and testing interactive applications
Package.Description: Expect is a tool for automating interactive applications such as telnet, ftp, passwd, fsck, rlogin, tip, etc. Expect is also useful for testing these same applications.
